Items.Title: Application No. C 210109 HAK (New Penn Development I) submitted by the Department of Housing Preservation and Development (HPD), pursuant to Article 16 of the General Municipal Law of New York State and 197 c of the New York City Charter for the designation of an Urban Development Action Area and an Urban Development Action Area Project for such area, and the disposition of such property to a developer to be selected by HPD, for property located at 306 Pennsylvania Avenue (Block 3754, Lot 31), 392 Wyona Street (Block 3774, Lot 138), and 426 Wyona Street – 467 Vermont Street (Block 3791, Lot 25), Borough of Brooklyn, Community District 5, Council District 42.
